```{r }
#Read in biomass data
Data <- read.csv("data/biomass_data.csv")
Data <- na.omit(Data)

# calculated mass per ml
#different volumes for sym (4ml) and host (5ml)
#sym <- 4
#host <- 5

#Load tissue homogenate volume
homog_vol <- read.csv("data/homogenate_vols.csv", header=TRUE)

# Load Surface area data
sa <- read_csv("output/surface.area.calc.csv")

# Coral sample metadata
metadata <- read_csv("data/corals_sampled.csv")

# Join homogenate volumes and surface area with sample metadata
metadata <- full_join(metadata, homog_vol, by="full_sample_id") %>%
  full_join(sa, by="full_sample_id")

#Standardize for volume input
Data <- Data %>%
  mutate(dry.pan.mass.g.ml = case_when(partner=="sym" ~ dry.pan.mass.g/volume, partner=="host" ~dry.pan.mass.g/volume),
         burnt.pan.mass.g.ml = case_when(partner=="sym" ~ burnt.pan.mass.g/volume, partner=="host" ~burnt.pan.mass.g/volume))

# Standardize for the total homogenate volume
Data <- right_join(Data, metadata, by="full_sample_id")  %>%
  mutate(dry.pan.mass.g.vol.corr = dry.pan.mass.g.ml*homog_vol_ml, 
         burnt.pan.mass.g.vol.corr = burnt.pan.mass.g.ml*homog_vol_ml) %>%
  mutate(dry.bioimass.g = (dry.pan.mass.g.vol.corr - initial.mass.g),
         DW.mg.cm2 = ((dry.bioimass.g)*1000) / surface.area.cm2) %>%
  mutate(afdry.bioimass.g = (dry.pan.mass.g.vol.corr - burnt.pan.mass.g.vol.corr),
         AFDW.mg.cm2 = ((afdry.bioimass.g)*1000) / surface.area.cm2)

```


```{r}
#summarize Dry Biomass mean and sem 

monthorder <- c("January", "February","March", "April","May",
                "June",  "July", "August", "September", 
                "October","November")

Data$timepoint <- factor(Data$timepoint.x,levels=monthorder)
Data$group <- paste0(Data$timepoint.x, "_", Data$site)
 
# Plot 
Data %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = timepoint, y = DW.mg.cm2, group=group, color=site.x)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(group=group, color=site.x))+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1) + # Plot all points
  scale_color_manual(values=c("#E69F00", "#56B4E9")) +
  #stat_summary(fun.data = mean_cl_normal, fun.args = list(mult = 1),    # Plot standard error

  labs(x = "", y = "Biomass (Âµg/cm2)") +

```

```{r}
#summarize AFDW mean and sem by site, species, and partner and plot
afdw<-afdw[!is.na(afdw$species),]#remove rows that are not identified for species and site

afdw %>% 
  group_by(species, site, partner)%>%
  summarise(mean.value = mean(AFDW.mg.cm2), se = std.error(AFDW.mg.cm2)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = site, y = mean.value, group = species, color = partner))+
  ylab("AFDW mg cm-2")+
  geom_point(size = 3)+
  geom_errorbar(aes(x = site, ymin = mean.value-se, ymax = mean.value+se), width = 0.5)+
  facet_grid(~species, scales = "free_y")


```
